Under data protection law, you have righ:
Phantsi komthetho wakho wokhuseleko lwedata, unamalungelo aquka: 

Ilungelo lakho lokufikelela - nelungelo lokucela iikopi zolwazi lwakho lobuqu

Ilungelo lakho lokulungiswa - unelungelo lokusicela ukuba silungise iinkcukacha zakho ocinga ukuba azichanekanga. Ukwanalo nelungelo lokusicela ukuba sigqibezele ulwazi ocinga ukuba aluphelelanga.

Ilungelo lakho lokucima - unelungelo lokusicela sicime iinkcukacha zakho kwiimeko ezithile.

Ilungelo akho lokurhoxisa imvume yokusetyenziswa kwedata yakho nangaliphi na ixesha - Unokukhetha ukunqumamisa ukusetyenziswa kwedatha yakho ukuba imvume ibisisisekho esisemthethweni sokufumana ulwazi lwakho.

Ilungelo lakho lokuthintela ukuqhubekeka - Unelungelo lokusicela ukuba sikuthintele ukusetyenziswa kolwazi lwakho buqu kwiimeko ezithile.

Unelungelo lokuchasa - unelungelo lokuchasa ukusetyenzwa kolwazi lwakho lobuqu kwiimeko ezithile.

Ilungelo lakho lokuphatheka kwedata - unelungelo lokucela ukuba ulwazi lomntu osinike lona siludlulisele komnye umbutho, okanye kuwe, kwiimeko ezithile.

Awunyanzelekanga ukuba uhlawule nayiphina intlawulo ngokusebenzisa amalungelo wakho. Ngokuxhomekeka kwiimeko kunye nohlobo lwesicelo sakho akunakwenzeka ukuba senze into oyicelileyo, umzekelo, apho kukho imfuneko esemthethweni okanye yesivumelwano sokuba siqhube idatha yakho kwaye akunakwenzeka ukuzalisekisa izibophelelo zethu ezisemthethweni ukuba sinokuyeka. Ulwazi oluthe vetshe ngamalungelo akho luyafumaneka kwi [Information Commissioner's Office (ICO)](https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/uk-gdpr-guidance-and-resources/individual-rights/individual-rights/).

Inyathelo 1. Vala amehlo akho uze utsale umoya kakhulu.

Phawula ukuba uziva njani ngokweemvakalelo.
 Phawula ukuba iimvakalelo zakho zintle okanye azintlanga. Zikhumbuze ukuba nokuba uvakalelwa njani, kulungile oko.
Phawula indlela ovakalelwa ngayo umzimba wakho. Phawula ukuba kukho indawo ebuhlungu okanye ebambekileyo.

Inyathelo 3. Nikela ingqalelo kwindlela ophefumla ngayo. Yiva umphefumlo wakho njenjoko ungena uze uphume. Unokubeka isandla esiswini sakho uze usive sinyuka size sehle njengoko uphefumla. Kwenze oku njengoko uphefumla kayi-10.

Inyathelo 4. Yandisa ukwazi umzimba wakho wonke. Mamela izandi zegumbi. 

Inyathelo 5. Thatha ithutyana ukuze lokuba ujonge ukuba uzive ngendlela eyahlukileyo na. Xa sele ukulungele, vula amehlo akho!

Uphumelele ekunqumameni. Ungayenza nangaliphi ixesha xana uziva unoxinzelelo. Ikunika ithuba lokuba uzole. Nokuba yimiphefumlo embalwa okanye unxulumana nomhlaba ongaphantsi kuwe kuyamenza umehluko. Unganqumama kunye nabantwana bakho!
Stand up and stretch your arms up to the:
Yima uze wolule iingalo zakho ziye phezulu. Tyhala nawaphi na amafu uze uvumele ilanga libe phezu kwakho. Yolula amacala akho omabini. Zolule ngaphambili nangasemva.

Beka izandla zakho emacaleni. Nyusa amagxa kancinci aye ngasezindlebeni njengoko uphefumla, nciphisa amehlo akho uze ubambe umoya wakho. Yeka amagxa akho njengoko umzimba wakho ukhululeka.

Yekelela iingalo zakho uze uzijingise emacaleni ngelixa ujika umziba wakho wangasentla. Iingalo zakho mazibethe umqolo wakho kancinci njengeko ujika usiya kwelinye icala.

Beka unyawo phambi kolunye uze wenze izangqa ngamaqatha, khumbula ukujikeleza kuwo omabini amacala. Unyawo ngalunye malwenze izangqa ezine kwicala ngalinye.

Ngoku shukumisa umzimba wakho wonke ngokukhawuleza kangoko unako. shukumisa phezulu! Goba uye ezantsi! Zivocavoce ujikelezisa isinqe!

Vala amehlo akho uze uphakamise iingalo zakho ucotha ziye entla kwentloko yakho njengoko utsala umoya. Thoba iingalo zakho ngokucotha zize zibe secaleni njengoko ukhupha umoya.

Thatha ithutyana ukuze ucinge ngamava akho.

Kulungile! Ungasenza esiseluleki nangaliphi na ixesha xana uzive ngathi udinda ukususa uxinzelelo kwaye ufune ukudlamkisa ingqondo kunye nomzimba.

Yenze uluhlu lwezinto ezisempilweni othanda ukuzenza. Nanga amanye amacebiso:
* Ukumamela ingoma oyithandayo
* Ukuhambahamba (ukuba kuvumelekile)
* Ukujima/ Ukuzilolonga
* Ukusela ikomityi yeti uwedwa
* Ukufowunela umhlobo wakho
* Ukucula, ukudanisa, ukuthandaza okanye ukufunda
* Ukuhlala elangeni uvale amehlo
* Ukubukela inkqubo oyithandayo ekwi-T. V.

Khetha ibe nye kwaye uyenze namhlanje!
When you take care of yourself, you take: Xa uzikhathalele, uhoye abantwana bakho. Sonke kufuneka sinxulumane. Zama ukuthetha nabahlobo, usapho, kunye nolunye uthungelwano lwenkxaso yonke imihla. Ukuba sekulithuba ugqibele ukufowunela umntu, kwenze ngoku oko!
Think about what makes you angry. When d:
Cinga malunga nento ekwenza ube nomsindo. Kwenzeka nini? Uqhele ukusabela njani?

Thintela ukuba nomsindo kwasekuqaleni. Lala okanye uphumle xa udiniwe. Zama ukutya into xa ulambile. Cela umntu akuxhase xa uziva ngathi uwedwa.
Ukulawula umsindo kunobunzima kakhulu. Thatha ikhefu xa uziva usiba nomsindo ngakubantwana bakho okanye omnye umntu.

Yiya kwenye indawo kangangemizuzu emi- 5 uze ukwazi ukubuyisa ulawulo lwemvakalelo zakho zakho. Ukuba kunendawo ekhuselekileyo phandle, yiya khona. Uza kudlula kule nto!
